name: Flayed Wraith
description: The Flayed Wraith is a tormented spirit embodying both psychological and physical torment, it hovers and has claw-like appendages that deal both slashing and necrotic damage.
memorable: It incapacitates enemies instead of killing them, allowing it to manipulate the battlefield and instill fear.
goals: To inflict fear and incapacitate foes rather than simply kill them.
relations: Could be related to other undead creatures or spirits tormenting the living.
environment: Typically found in dark and haunted locations, where suffering and torment dwell.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage and resistance to cold damage as well as nonmagical physical damage.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity, causing disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks in sunlight.
attacks: Utilizes Howl of Agony to cause incapacitation followed by claw attacks for slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Howl of Agony, incapacitating a target while dealing psychic damage.
senses: Has a low passive perception of 9, reflecting its weakness in detecting hidden threats.
additional_information: Releases a terrifying scream that affects the mind of its targets.
Can hover and is not bound by ground movement.
Cunning and strategic in taking down enemies without outright killing them.
Relies heavily on psychic damage to debilitate foes.
Can create tension on the battlefield by incapacitating strong enemies.
test_queries: wraith with claw attacks and fear abilities
ghostly figure that leaves victims unconscious
creature that thrives in dark environments
